name: Al.One
description:
We built this game in 17 days for a Unity Game Jam in February of 2018. You can read about it here: https://itch.io/jam/unity-course-community-jam The theme was "Spin". 

All of the models, sounds, and music and most of the textures were created by us during the 17 day time. 

On the team we had:

Concept: Adrian Rodriguez (PixelBurrow.tk)
Game Mechanics: Dave Zokvic (DaveZokvic.com) and Jeff Rush (TheDataYouNeed.com)
Interface Design: Adrian Rodriguez and David Brooks (DavidNBrooks.com)
Development: David Brooks 
3D Modeling: Kerry Brooks (fairyandfable.com) and David Brooks
Music: Light The Deep (LightTheDeep.com) and Franco Lezameta (https://soundcloud.com/gianfranko-1)

You can see some behind-the-scenes screenshots and read about the process of building the game at NorthwardCompass.com/alone (The game files for Mac and Windows are available to download there, as well as the source for the game.)

A special thank you to these people and teams for their awesome (FREE) stuff...

@keijiro for his work on KinoGlitch: https://github.com/keijiro/KinoGlitch

Michael Kremmel for MK Glow Free: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/mk-g...

CrazyTextures for Metal 06: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/metals/metal-06-2381...

RKD for Sky5X One: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/sky5x-one-6332
